WorkItem.Description:
I have my Druid Moonkin set up pretty close to how i would expect. SP>all other stats.
When I check Moonkin form, Int jumps tremendously making 16 Int Gem> 19 SP.
I noticed it when it made Greatness Card: Int go from slightly less than Illustration of Dragon Soul(172-195) all the way up to 350, more than double before i checked that 1 box.
When i added gemming with a 16 int gem, it was then worth more than the exact same item gemmed for 19 SP.
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Enabling Spell Critical Chance : Moonkin Form seems to totally throw INT rating out of whack

Comments.Message: Your buffs are not set up correctly.  Rawr is projecting that you will run out of mana.  Since Intellect is your most powerful mana regen stat, it will be at the top of the list.
